meanings.definition: The act or process of rotating automatically.
meanings.sent1: The autorotation of the windmill blades generated electricity efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The helicopter safely landed using autorotation after the engine failed.
meanings.sent3: The autorotation of the lazy Susan made passing the salt a fun game at dinner.
meanings.sent4: The autorotation of the Earth around the sun keeps the seasons changing.
meanings.sent5: The autorotation of the fan blades created a soothing breeze in the room.

meanings.definition: A state of rotation in which an object spins freely without external power.
meanings.sent1: The toy top's autorotation fascinated the children as it spun effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The autorotation of the propeller allowed the plane to glide smoothly through the air.
meanings.sent3: The autorotation of the pinwheel in the wind brought smiles to the faces of onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The autorotation of the galaxy's arms creates a mesmerizing spiral in space.
meanings.sent5: The autorotation of the record player's turntable played music throughout the room.
